block.p: GREENBERG--Adolph loving and beloved husband of Joan. Devoted father, grandfather, and great-grandfather, dear brother. Services ''BoulevardRiverside'', 1450 Broadway, Hewlett LI, 12 noon Friday.

$(6$)GREENBERG--Adolph. The Officers, Board and Congregants of Temple Emanu-El of Lynbrook record with great sorrow the death of our beloved past President. We extend heartfelt condolences to Joan and his family. Bruce Kerner, President Rabbi Scott Corngold
